short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prompts users to raise funds for Heartfulness when shopping on Amazon.in

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension is for Heartfulness Meditation practitioners to raise funds while they shop on Amazon. This extension will prompt the user to redirect to the amazon affiliate link.
